ShortDescription.Value: This mod allows you to use the ingame radio to control playback and volume of your own playing music (spotify, youtube etc.)

Publish.LongDescription:
# Radio Media Control This mod allows you to use the ingame radio control to control playback and volume of your local media. This includes Spotify, Youtube, and other media players.
## Features - Play/Pause - Volume Control (Controls your system volume, not that of the media player) - Next/Previous
## Feature roadmap - I might look into integrating actual third party media players (like spotify with playlist selection), but I can't promise anything.
